title: Fruit, fructose and diabetes with Robby Barbaro MPH and Cyrus Khambatta, PhD
description:
In Episode #168 we hear from Robby Barbaro and Cyrus Khambatta - New York Times best selling Authors of Mastering Diabetes.

What are the underlying mechanisms that cause insulin resistance? Is fruit and fructose bad? How should we eat to improve blood sugar control? It's all here in this condensed throwback episode.

Hope you enjoy.

Mastering Diabetes on Instagram
